dec:processunit.name: Remove unusable track segments
dec:processunit.description: Removes all track segments that don'T contain the minimum data to be able to classify the segments

property.name: Remove short Segment on/off
property.description: (De) activates the option whether segments with a length shorter than specified be the property Segment length should be removed or not

property.name: Segment length
property.description: Segments which are shorter then the specified length will be removed if the the property Remove short segment on/off is activeated.
